attributes.action: remove Sharon Shoesmith and associated staff from Haringey LSCB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the Victoria Climbie shambles once again Haringey council are embroiled in an incredibly sad killing of another child and yet the Chair of their LSCB, Sharon Shoesmith, remains in place as do her incompetent staff.

These people need to be removed from their positions immediately, there should be no second chance to allow them the possibility to lose another poor child in this manner.

Please remove these people from their roles immediately!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
